import React, {useEffect, useState} from "react"; import { useDispatch, useSelector } from "react-redux"; import { useHistory } from "react-router-dom"; import { createPost, deletePost, getPosts, getPostsByCategory } from "../../action/PostAction"; import style from "../style/Homepage.module.css" import moment from 'moment' import { getCategories } from "../../action/CategoryAction"; import Pagination from "./Pagination/Pagination"; import jwt_decode from 'jwt-decode' import DeleteIcon from '@mui/icons-material/Delete' import {Button} from '@mui/material' const urls = [ 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1549631998-6d554b1402ae?ixlib=rb-4.0.3&ixid=MnwxMjA3fDB8MHxwaG90by1wYWdlfHx8fGVufDB8fHx8&auto=format&fit=crop&w=2128&q=80', 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1451187580459-43490279c0fa?ixlib=rb-4.0.3&ixid=MnwxMjA3fDB8MHxwaG90by1wYWdlfHx8fGVufDB8fHx8&auto=format&fit=crop&w=1172&q=80', 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1614732414444-096e5f1122d5?ixlib=rb-4.0.3&ixid=MnwxMjA3fDB8MHxwaG90by1wYWdlfHx8fGVufDB8fHx8&auto=format&fit=crop&w=1074&q=80', 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1630839437035-dac17da580d0?ixlib=rb-4.0.3&ixid=MnwxMjA3fDB8MHxwaG90by1wYWdlfHx8fGVufDB8fHx8&auto=format&fit=crop&w=1615&q=80', 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1630694093867-4b947d812bf0?ixlib=rb-4.0.3&ixid=MnwxMjA3fDB8MHxwaG90by1wYWdlfHx8fGVufDB8fHx8&auto=format&fit=crop&w=1615&q=80' ] const HomePage = () => { //all required paramets let posts, role, decode const history = useHistory() let [category, setCategory] = useState('') let [title, setTitle] = useState('') let [content, setContent] = useState('') let [currentPage, setCurrentPage] = useState(1) let [postPerPage] = useState(5) const dispatch = useDispatch() //get info from global store const data = useSelector(state => state.Post) const auth = useSelector(store => store.Auth) const categorySelector = useSelector(store => store.Category) //take token const token = auth.token if (token != '') { decode = jwt_decode(token) role = decode.role } const indexOfLastPost = currentPage * postPerPage const indexOfFirstPost = indexOfLastPost - postPerPage //dispatch All information const pagination = (pageNumber) => {setCurrentPage(pageNumber)} useEffect(() => { dispatch(getPosts()) dispatch(getCategories()) },[dispatch]) let truepost let categorie = categorySelector.categories posts = data.allPost console.log(posts); if (posts === undefined) { posts = [] } if (categorie.length === 0) { categorie = [] } else { for (let index = 0; index < posts.length; index++) { const element = array[index]; } const currentPosts = posts.slice(indexOfFirstPost, indexOfLastPost) return ( <> {token === '' ? //if not sign in
{currentPosts.map((pst) =>
{history.push(`/register`)}}>{pst.login}
{history.push(`register`)}}>

Title: {pst.title}

Content: {pst.info.substring(0,15).concat('...')}

{moment(pst.time).fromNow()}

)}
: //if sign in <> {role === 'admin' ? <>
dispatch({type:e.target.value, payload:posts})}>

Sort:







dispatch(getPostsByCategory(e.target.value))} >

Choose category:

{categorie.map( (category) =>
)}
{currentPosts.map((pst) =>
{history.push(`/user/${pst.user_id}`)}}>{pst.login}
{history.push(`/post/${pst.id}`)}}>

Title: {pst.title}

Content: {pst.info.substring(0,15)}

{moment(pst.time).fromNow()}

)}
